Name: Hitler Hates Anime
About the game: Hitler Hates Anime is a satirical and funny game about the Fuhrer who decided to destroy an anime. Take Adolf Hitler under your control and with the power of mighty dildo destroy all naughty anime girls! You'll be dropped on the island with innumerous anime girls. Your goal is to find them all and hit with your dildo weapon. But keep in mind that you have to be fast because your head is growing with every second and once it reaches 100% it will explode! To postpone it you should hit the girls. Collect various mushrooms to get temporary boosts and make your task easier. Benefits: Real Adolf Hitler under your control Cute anime girls with no clothes (18+) Deadly dildo weapons Fun and ridiculous gameplay Global leaderboards and achievements for more fun This is the craziest game you have ever seen before. So what are you waiting for? /
